summary.headline: Busy week ahead: 4 hot signals, 12 external meetings, 3 pilots in motion
urgentActions: Follow up with Dominique (Laeka) - excited about renewal deck
Monitor Maestro - reviewing internally + viewed Gong recording
Await Cory booking - product org interest, will schedule next week
Schedule Balaji for week of Feb 10-14

hot.quote: Hi Jonathan Thank you for this, I am really excited. The deck looks great!
hot.recommendedAction: Strike while iron is hot - follow up within 24h

hot.quote: We will discuss internally and get back on the next steps timing
hot.recommendedAction: Wait 3-5 days then check in, reference they viewed the recording

hot.quote: I am curious about how my product org may be able to utilize Reforge, I will grab some time with you next week.
hot.recommendedAction: Let them book, prepare product org use cases

warm.quote: Currently traveling... Can we meet the following week?
warm.recommendedAction: Send calendar link for week of Feb 10-14

intel.description: Data-driven growth hacking agency helping businesses scale
intel.services: Strategy development, growth marketing, customer acquisition
intel.approach: Rapid testing, performance tracking, low-cost strategies
intel.testimonial: Tripled customer revenues for Aannab (COO Naila AlKhalawi)
intel.prepTip: Small agency - may be price sensitive. Focus on ROI and efficiency gains.

intel.description: Christian publishing house in Moscow, Idaho
intel.prepTip: Traditional publishing - may be interested in Research product for audience insights. Non-traditional tech buyer.

intel.description: Health and nutrition app for weight loss and healthy eating
intel.features: AI calorie tracking, food logging, meal planning, barcode scanner
intel.prepTip: Consumer app with large user base - product feedback volume likely high. Build product fits well.

antonMoritz.focus: Building & scaling AI-driven product & tech teams
antonMoritz.insight: Says AI teams require 'completely different approach' than traditional tech orgs

intel.prepTip: AI transformation background - strong fit for Reforge. Can speak to team scaling challenges.

intel.note: Multiple 'Delos' entities exist - likely Delos Capital (PE) or separate VC
intel.prepTip: Clarify which Delos - if VC, they may want to evaluate for portfolio companies

intel.description: Free weekly developer tools newsletter - console.dev
intel.content: Reviews of devtools and beta releases
intel.prepTip: Developer-focused media company - feedback from developer audience could be valuable. Configure for dev tool reviews/feedback.

intel.description: Global leader in business sustainability ratings
intel.competitive: Compared to Replit in Build space
intel.prepTip: ESG/sustainability focus - may have complex taxonomy needs. Note Replit competitive concern.

intel.description: Camping booking platform by ADAC (German auto club)
intel.experience: 70+ years camping expertise across parent clubs
intel.app: PiNCAMP Camping by ADAC on iOS/Android
intel.prepTip: European travel/booking platform - likely interested in guest/user feedback analysis.

intel.services: Online consultations, Rx/OTC medications, supplements, diagnostics, screening
intel.focus: ED, weight loss, hair loss, testosterone, general men's health
intel.features: Personalized coaching, clinician chats, health tracking app
intel.prepTip: Healthcare SaaS - sensitive data considerations. Product feedback from male health users.

intel.description: Israel's leading credit card and financial technology company
intel.subsidiaries: Isracard LTD, Europay LTD, Aminit LTD, American Express Israel
intel.services: Credit card issuing, loans, credit services, flexible payments
intel.prepTip: Large Israeli fintech - enterprise deal potential. Financial services compliance needs.

intel.description: Point-of-sale financing and BNPL platform for banks/lenders
intel.value: Enables banks to launch branded BNPL programs or grow unsecured lending
intel.partners: First National Bank of Omaha, EXL
intel.recognition: Referenced by Federal Reserve Bank of Kansas City
intel.prepTip: B2B fintech serving banks - may need feedback from merchant/consumer touchpoints.

intel.description: Fleet management software for vehicles, equipment, drivers
intel.scale: Thousands of users managing hundreds of thousands of vehicles
intel.features: Maintenance tracking, fuel economy, scheduling, FMCSA compliance
intel.prepTip: Established fleet SaaS - operational feedback from fleet managers and drivers.
